action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
USPTO Funds for Efficient and Effective Services Act or the USPTO FEES Act
This bill amends the Leahy-Smith America Invents Act to extend for eight years the authority of the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office to set and adjust patent fees.
